name: revival-herb
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Revives a fainted Pokémon and restores its HP to full. Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.
short_effect: Revives with full HP, but lowers happiness.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A very bitter herb that revives a fainted POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: A very bitter herb that revives a fainted POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A very bitter medicinal herb. It revives a fainted POKéMON, restoring HP fully.
